stadium|(n)|sân vận động|Ví dụ:|Thousands of football fans packed into the stadium to watch the match.
stand|(n)|khán đài|Ví dụ:|The stand is full of audience.
pitch|(n)|sân thi đấu|Ví dụ:|The pitch is big.
touchline|(n)|đường biên dọc|Ví dụ:|She spends her Saturday afternoons standing on the touchline, watching her boyfriend play football.
penalty area|(n)|vòng cấm địa|Ví dụ:|Finally, ball was in penalty area.
goal|(n)|khung thành|Ví dụ:|Black kicked the ball into the goal.
penalty|(n)|quả phạt đền|Ví dụ:|They scored from a penalty awarded when Jenkins handled the ball.
corner kick|(n)|đá phạt góc|Ví dụ:|That corner kick is the main reason for this goal.
free kick|(n)|đá phạt trực tiếp|Ví dụ:|Referee decided to award them a free kick at the 70th minute.
indirect free kick|(n)|đá phạt gián tiếp|Ví dụ:|Referee decided to award MU team an indirect free kick.
kick off|(v)|bắt đầu trận đấu bóng đá|Ví dụ:|The game kicks off at 7.30.
throw-in|(n)|quả ném biên|Ví dụ:|Valeron loses the ball but wins a throw-in.
offside|(adj)|việt vị|Ví dụ:|After arguing, referee decided Red Team was offside in that situation.
corner Flag|(n)|cờ cắm ở góc sân bóng đá|Ví dụ:|This corner flag is suited for high school games.
bet|(v)|cá độ, đánh cược|Ví dụ:|Thousands of people bet on the result of the match.
the bench|(n)|băng ghế dự bị|Ví dụ:|He was injured, and spent the last few weeks of the season on the bench.
foul|(n)|lỗi, pha phạm lỗi|Ví dụ:|He was sent off for a foul.
goal line|(n)|đường vạch khung thành|Ví dụ:|The ball has rolled over the goal line.
shoot|(v)|(bóng rổ) ném bóng|Ví dụ:|He shoots|strongly.
goalkeeper|(n)|thủ môn|Ví dụ:|He is the best goalkeeper I've ever known.
defender|(n)|hậu vệ|Ví dụ:|The Brazilian attack put France's defenders under pressure.
centre back|(n)|trung vệ|Ví dụ:|Here are the best centre backs in FIFA 13.
midfielder|(n)|trung vệ (bóng đá)|Ví dụ:|Inter Milan have signed two new midfielders.
attacking midfielder|(n)|tiền vệ tấn công|Ví dụ:|An attacking midfielder is a very valuable part of the team.
winger|(n)|tiền vệ cánh nói chung|Ví dụ:|Liverpool have just spent £800,000 on the talented 25-year-old winger.
referee|(n)|trọng tài|Ví dụ:|The referee warned him for dangerous play.
commentator|(n)|bình luận viên|Ví dụ:|He also worked as a television sports commentator.
supporter|(n)|cổ động viên|Ví dụ:|Thousands of supporters have travelled to London for the cup final.
linesman|(n)|trọng tài biên|Ví dụ:|In some special cases, referee will depend on linesman to make decision.
hooligan|(n)|kẻ côn đồ, quá khích|Ví dụ:|Hooligans had sprayed paint all over the car.
red card|(n)|thẻ đỏ|Ví dụ:|At the 75th minute of match, the first red card appeared.
yellow card|(n)|thẻ vàng|Ví dụ:|He became more careful after receiving a yellow card.
coach|(n)|huấn luyện viên|Ví dụ:|He used to be a soccer coach.
transfer|(n)|cầu thủ chuyển nhượng|Ví dụ:|They've a new transfer from Tottenham playing for them.
reserve team|(n)|đội dự bị|Ví dụ:|There is always a reserve team for each team in a match.
caution|(n)|sự cảnh cáo|Ví dụ:|As it was his first offence, he was only given a caution.
stimulant|(n)|chất kích thích|Ví dụ:|Caffeine, which is found in coffee and tea, is a mild stimulant.
strategy|(n)|chiến lược|Ví dụ:|Good strategy may help them become the winner.
striker|(n)|tiền đạo (bóng đá)|Ví dụ:|The club's new manager is a former England striker.
